colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @358A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, MCHOG TU DGA' BA'I RGYAL PO LA SOGS PA, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO THAMS CAD DANG, LHA DANG, MI DANG, LHA MA YIN DANG, DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN THAMS CAD, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA YI RANGS TE, MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA BSKAL BZANG PO PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO, ,RDZOGS S+HO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO BIDY'A KA RA SIDHA DANG, LO TZ'A BA BANDE DPAL GYI DBYANGS KYIS BSGYUR, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZ'A BA BANDE DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA, SHO LO KA BDUN STONG BRGYAD BRGYA STE, BAM PO NYI SHU RTZA RTZA DRUG BZHUGS S+HO,, ,, BKRA SHIS SHOG , ,,MANNGA LAm, ,
